it.cnr.isti.hpc.dexter.spot

Class ContextExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.hpc.dexter.spot.ContextExtractor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArticleContextExtractor

    public class ContextExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    A ContextExtractor extract the context of a spot (i.e., text around the the spot)
    Author:
    Diego Ceccarelli, diego.ceccarelli@isti.cnr.it created on 24/lug/2012
